trans-unit.source: @'Stride.Engine.Entity' is the base class for objects that are managed by the high-level engine.
trans-unit.target: @'Stride.Engine.Entity' is the base class for objects that are managed by the high-level engine.

trans-unit.source: To improve flexibility, entity are component-based: they can contains as many components as required, containing data and/or logic.
trans-unit.target: To improve flexibility, entity are component-based: they can contains as many components as required, containing data and/or logic.

trans-unit.source: A @'Stride.Engine.Entitycomponent' is tied to its entity (that is, one component can't be added to two entities at the same time).
